text:
i have tried tomcat 4.0.4 on a linux server, but it has the problem of auto-
recompile jsp. then, i found out that this is a known bug and downloaded the 
latest 4.1.9 milestone build (which said that the bug ix fixed).
unfortunately, i still facing this bug.
FYI, I have set development and reloading flag to 'true' already.
as below:
    <servlet>
        <servlet-name>jsp</servlet-name>
        <servlet-class>org.apache.jasper.servlet.JspServlet</servlet-class>
        <init-param>
            <param-name>logVerbosityLevel</param-name>
            <param-value>WARNING</param-value>
        </init-param>
        <init-param>
            <param-name>development</param-name>
            <param-value>true</param-value>
        </init-param>
        <init-param>
            <param-name>reloading</param-name>
            <param-value>true</param-value>
        </init-param>
        <load-on-startup>3</load-on-startup>
    </servlet>



Can you help me to check on this?
creator: lkt@royalselangor.com.my

text:
It sounds like samba isn't playing nicely.  It definetly sounds like
it's now not a tomcat issue, but an issue with how samba saves files
(not resetting an attribute?).  You should close your bug, marking it
invalid.


- Andrew
